insert into p_user (isUser, phone, payPassword, `state`, strawUid, nickName, `name`, balance, integral, totalIntegral, bankName, bankBranch, bankCard, idCard, createTime, disableTime, uncoilTime, strawPath, knotId, knotAmount, teamOneNum, teamSuitNum) values (#{isUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{strawUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{integral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalIntegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{disableTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uncoilTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{strawPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{knotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{knotAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{teamOneNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teamSuitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update p_user
isUser = #{isUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payPassword = #{payPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
strawUid = #{strawUid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
nickName = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
integral = #{integral,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
totalIntegral = #{totalIntegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bankName = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bankBranch = #{bankBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bankCard = #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idCard = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
disableTime = #{disableTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
uncoilTime = #{uncoilTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
strawPath = #{strawPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
knotId = #{knotId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
knotAmount = #{knotAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
teamOneNum = #{teamOneNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
teamSuitNum = #{teamSuitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wxQrCode = #{wxQrCode},
agent = #{agent},
topUpBalance = #{topUpBalance},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update p_user set isUser = #{isUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payPassword = #{payPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, strawUid = #{strawUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, nickName = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, totalIntegral = #{totalIntegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bankName = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankBranch = #{bankBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankCard = #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idCard = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, disableTime = #{disableTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uncoilTime = #{uncoilTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, strawPath = #{strawPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, knotId = #{knotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, knotAmount = #{knotAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, teamOneNum = #{teamOneNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teamSuitNum = #{teamSuitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select u.id,u.balance,u.integral,u.teamOneNum,u.teamSuitNum,u.isUser,k.rate,u.phone,u.agent,u.topUpBalance, (select count(*) from p_user where strawUid=u.id) as teamPeopleNum, (select count(*) from p_collect where uid=u.id) as collectNum, (select count(*) from p_user_voucher where uid=u.id and state=0 and useState=0) as voucherNum, (select count(*) from p_order where uid=u.id and state=0 and isDel=0) as waitingPayOrderNum, (select count(*) from p_order where uid=u.id and state=1 and isDel=0) as waitingSendOrderNum, (select count(*) from p_order where uid=u.id and state=2 and isDel=0) as waitingTakeOrderNum from p_user u left join p_knot_config k on u.knotId=k.id where u.id=#{0}
select count(*) from p_user where strawUid=#{0}

select u.id,u.strawUid,u.phone,u.balance,u.integral,u.isUser,u.nickName,ul.headPath, (select ifnull(sum(`number`),0) from p_order where uid=u.id and state > 0) as payOrderNum from p_user u left join p_user_login ul on u.id=ul.uid where u.strawUid=#{0} order by u.id desc

select
from p_user where phone = #{phone} limit 1

select u.id,u.isUser,u.phone,u.payPassword,u.state,u.strawUid,u.nickName,u.name,u.balance,u.integral,u.totalIntegral,u.bankName,u.bankBranch,u.bankCard, u.idCard,u.createTime,u.disableTime,u.uncoilTime,u.strawPath,u.knotId,u.knotAmount,u.teamOneNum,u.teamSuitNum,u.itemBuyAmount,u.itemLeftAmount,u.suitLevelNum, kc.rate from p_user u left join p_knot_config kc on u.knotId=kc.id where u.isUser = 1

select u.id,u.isUser,u.phone,u.payPassword,u.state,u.strawUid,u.nickName,u.name,u.balance,u.integral,u.totalIntegral,u.bankName,u.bankBranch,u.bankCard, u.idCard,u.createTime,u.disableTime,u.uncoilTime,u.strawPath,u.knotId,u.knotAmount,u.teamOneNum,u.teamSuitNum,u.itemBuyAmount,u.itemLeftAmount,u.suitLevelNum, sw.phone as strawPhone,kc.rate, (select count(*) from p_user_voucher where voucherId=1 and useState >= 0 and state=0 and uid=u.id) as sixCouponNum, (select count(*) from p_user_voucher where voucherId=2 and useState >= 0 and state=0 and uid=u.id) as threeCouponNum, (select count(*) from p_order where state>0 and uid=u.id) as orderNum, (select count(*) from p_user where strawUid=u.id) as teamUser from p_user u left join p_user sw on u.strawUid=sw.id left join p_knot_config kc on u.knotId=kc.id where u.id=#{0}

select
from p_user order by id asc limit 1
